text: athamek wruksha dewiyek bawata path we.

ee 1977 di janathawa agamathi washayen thora path karagath je. aar. jayawardhana thamanta parlimenthuwa thula himiwu 5/6 ka balaya upayogi karagena wyawasthawa sanshodhanaya karamin purna widhayaka balathala sahitha janadhipathiwaraya bawata pathwu awasthawayi.
